wolf_menace.name: Wolf Menace
wolf_menace.description: The shepherd's flock is being attacked by wolves. Help him by killing 10 wolves.

node.hunt: Hunt down the wolves threatening the shepherd's flock
node.return: Return to the shepherd for your reward

herb_gathering.name: Rare Herbs
herb_gathering.description: The alchemist needs rare herbs for his potions. Collect 10 herbs from the forest.

node.return: Deliver the herbs to the alchemist

pirate_threat.name: Pirate Threat
pirate_threat.description: Pirates are raiding the merchant's supply routes. Eliminate 10 pirates to stop them.

node.hunt: Hunt down the pirates raiding supply routes
node.return: Return to the merchant for payment
